Ext.toolbar.Separator Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.toolbar.Separator Ext.Toolbar.Separator tbseparator toolbar tbar
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Toolbar Separator Example',
        width: 300,
        height: 200,
        tbar: ['Item 1',
        {
            xtype: 'tbseparator'
        }, 'Item 2'],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
